title: Starship Sound Effects
description: A collection of starship sound effects that includes 110 sounds for turbine, door opening, looped engines, energy ray, laser and plasma weapons, panel and interface sounds, and more.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/starship-sound-effects-short-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pyq0dn6pq60rvou/MSE%20-%20Starship%20Sound%20Effects_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of futuristic starship sounds to bring your spaceship to life with engines, dashboard, laser and plasma weapons, turbines, and more. Charge the laser guns, turn on the turbine and engine, and conquer neighboring galaxies.


The package contains 110 sound effects, including sounds of looped engines, turbine launches, dashboard and interface sounds, buttons, laser and plasma gun shots, door opening, energy sounds, starship devices, energy rays, pass-by sounds, and more.


An wide variety of sound effects are great for all types of space transportation, and they can also be used for ground-based futuristic vehicles, their mechanisms, sounding of sci-fi weapons, energy, all sorts of launches and activation systems, batteries, barriers, force fields, and more.


All sound effects are designed with different synthesizers, which means that there is no extraneous noise in them. For some sounds, additional reverb and delay processing has been used.


The sounds of the engines, laser and plasma weapons are presented in a mono version.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 110 sound effects
  • 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • engine and weapon sounds in a mono version
  • wide variety of futuristic systems
  • seamless engine loops
  • great for all types of space transportation, sci-fi vehicles, futuristic weapons, interfaces, mechanisms, and more


Number of Audio Waves: 110

Number of Audio Cues: 110

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes (seamless engine and two interface loops), No (other sounds)

Minutes of audio provided: 08 minutes 47 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
